description: Numbers n such that continued fraction for sqrt(n) has odd period and central term 14.
mathematica: cfo14Q[n_]:=Module[{s=Sqrt[n],cf,len},cf=If[IntegerQ[s],{}, ContinuedFraction[ s][[2]]];len=Length[cf];OddQ[len] && cf[[(len+1)/2]] == 14]; Select[Range[54000],cfo14Q] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 10 2013 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Corrected and definition clarified by _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 10 2013
